pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `beautiful`[![pypi](https://badge.fury.io/py/beautiful.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/beautiful/)[![Made with Python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/beautiful)](https://www.python.org/)[![Type hinted - mypy validated](https://img.shields.io/badge/typehinted-yes-teal)](https://github.com/kalaspuff/beautiful)[![MIT License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/kalaspuff/beautiful.svg)](https://github.com/kalaspuff/beautiful/blob/master/LICENSE)[![Code coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/kalaspuff/beautiful/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/kalaspuff/beautiful/tree/master/beautiful)*A collection of functions and classes to aid developers into building better code faster.*## Installation with `pip`Like you would install any other Python package, use `pip`, `poetry`, `pipenv` or your weapon of choice.```$ pip install beautiful```## Usage and examples#### Use-case```import beautiful```
